description: Offering full backward compatibility and incorporating features from previous middleware versions, SafeNet Authentication Client ensures complete support for all currently deployed eToken devices, as well as SafeNet IDPrime smart cards.
summary: SafeNet Authentication Client is a middleware client that manages Thales' extensive SafeNet portfolio of certificate-based authenticators, including eTokens, SafeNet IDPrime smart cards, USB and software-based devices.
author: Thales DIS CPL USA,  Inc.
